WorkItem.Description:
I have looked everywhere but can't find anywhere a valid working example of using Polymer with TypeScript.
This is the last step I need before choosing between Dart and TypeScript.

Is there anywhere in the documentation a complete and working example of a polymer component created using Polymer?

Thanks

Comments.Message: The issue tracker is for bugs, please use the Codeplex discussion forums here https://typescript.codeplex.com/discussions and the usual other Q&A sources (ie StackOverflow) for questions of this sort.
